import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProductService from '../../../service/product.service' import './CartList.css' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' // import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' //import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class CartList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { products: [{}] } this.productService = new ProductService() } getProductInfo() { const id = this.props.match.params.productId this.productService.getProduct(id) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getProductInfo() } render() { return (

Your Products

Product Unit Price Quantity Subtotal
{this.state.name} Mark Otto @mdo
Keep Buying ) } } export default CartList
